10 int32_t previous_EncoderR;
11 double deltaLeft;
12 double deltaRight;
13 double meter_per_tick = 0.0008;
14 double x = 0.0;
15 double y = 0.0;
16 double th = 0.0;
17 double v_linear=0.0;

25 
26 void encoderdata_callback(const custom_messages::md49_encoders& md49_encoders){
27  //EncoderL=encoders.encoder_l;
28  //EncoderR=encoders.encoder_r;
29  //current_time_encoder = ros::Time::now();
30  // calculate odomety
31  // *****************
32  deltaLeft = md49_encoders.encoder_l - previous_EncoderL;
33  deltaRight = md49_encoders.encoder_r - previous_EncoderR;
34 
35  vx = deltaLeft * meter_per_tick;
36  vy = deltaRight * meter_per_tick;
37 
38  previous_EncoderL = md49_encoders.encoder_l;
39  previous_EncoderR = md49_encoders.encoder_r;
40  //last_time_encoder = current_time_encoder;
41 }
42 
43 int main( int argc, char* argv[] ){
44  ros::init(argc, argv, "odometry" );
45  ros::NodeHandle n;
46  ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("/md49_encoders", 100, encoderdata_callback);
47  ros::Publisher odom_pub = n.advertise<nav_msgs::Odometry>("odom", 50);
48  tf::TransformBroadcaster odom_broadcaster;
49 
50  ros::Time current_time, last_time;
51  current_time = ros::Time::now();
52  last_time = ros::Time::now();
53 
54 
55  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
56  while(n.ok()){
57 
58  current_time = ros::Time::now();
59 
60  //compute odometry in a typical way given the velocities of the robot
61  double dt = (current_time - last_time).toSec();
62  double delta_x = (vx * cos(th) - vy * sin(th)) * dt;
63  double delta_y = (vx * sin(th) + vy * cos(th)) * dt;
64  double delta_th = vth * dt;
65 
66  x += delta_x;
67  y += delta_y;
68  th += delta_th;
69 
70  //distance_traveled=(vx+vy)/2;
71  //v_linear = distance_traveled/dt; // linear velocity
72  //th = ( vy - vx ) / base_width;
73  //v_angular = th/dt; //angular velocity
74 
75 
76 
77  //since all odometry is 6DOF we'll need a quaternion created from yaw
78  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(th);
79 
80  //first, we'll publish the transform over tf
81  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans;
82  odom_trans.header.stamp = current_time;
83  odom_trans.header.frame_id = "odom";
84  odom_trans.child_frame_id = "base_link";
85 
86  odom_trans.transform.translation.x = x;
87  odom_trans.transform.translation.y = y;
88  odom_trans.transform.translation.z = 0.0;
89  odom_trans.transform.rotation = odom_quat;
90 
91  //send the transform
92  odom_broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans);
93 
94  //next, we'll publish the odometry message over ROS
95  nav_msgs::Odometry odom;
96  odom.header.stamp = current_time;
97  odom.header.frame_id = "odom";
98 
99  //set the position
100  odom.pose.pose.position.x = x;
101  odom.pose.pose.position.y = y;
102  odom.pose.pose.position.z = 0.0;
103  odom.pose.pose.orientation = odom_quat;
104 
105  //set the velocity
106  odom.child_frame_id = "base_link";
107  odom.twist.twist.linear.x = vx;
108  odom.twist.twist.linear.y = vy;
109  odom.twist.twist.angular.z = vth;
110 
111  //publish the message
112  odom_pub.publish(odom);
113 
114  last_time = current_time;
115  ros::spinOnce();
116  loop_rate.sleep();
117  }
118 }
